content:
Managing Editor

Junior Emily Shepard performs on the floor during the Pink Meet against Temple in Reynolds Coliseum on Friday Feb PERIOD   PERIOD NC State lost .. PERIOD

Wolfpack gymnastics finished second in its quad meet on Sunday March  with its score of . serving as the thirdhighest mark in the programs history PERIOD

The Pack fell just short of topping Maryland which finished the day with a score of . but took down Yale and William  Mary which scored . and . respectively PERIOD Posting a thirdbest score in program history is no joke especially considering the fatigue facing the team after completing four competitions in the last  days PERIOD

A score good enough for the program record books required massive inputs from multiple members of the team with junior Emily Shephards contributions arguably being the most important to todays success Her scores of . and . on beam and the floor respectively improved her career total of . marks to  tying the programs alltime record PERIOD The previously mentioned . for her floor routine also finished as the highest mark for any member of the Pack across all events on the day PERIOD

NC States best performance of the day came during its floor routine performances boasting the highest team score in the event across all competitors in the meet PERIOD With a score of . led in large part by Shepards previously mentioned . nC State squeaked past Maryland in the only event it would take over the Terps PERIOD As impressive as Shepards performance was on the floor freshman Lauren Rutherford posted a . in the event as well proving to be an equally essential component to competing with Maryland PERIOD

The Wolfpack also managed an impressive showing on vault with a team score of . its highest mark in the event all year PERIOD Led by .825s from Rutherford junior Alexis Ortega freshman Lucy Lehman and graduate student Gabrielle Kistner NC States team score fell just short of Marylands . but handily cleared the . and . team scores from Yale and William  Mary respectively PERIOD

For bars and the beam the Pack posted a . team score in each with .875s from Rutherford and freshman Hailey Merchant in the first event and .900s from Sherpard Ortega and graduate student Nicole Webb in the second PERIOD A . on bars was good enough to tie for first in the meet alongside Maryland but fell just short of the Terrapins . on beam PERIOD

Second place in a quad meet in a teams fourth competition in  days is quite a feat especially when that finish comes alongside a topthree score in program history PERIOD Pack gymnastics will have a work week of rest before getting back into its schedule with another quad meet on Friday March  in Raleigh PERIOD The meet will feature Rutgers which NC State has already taken down twice this season Pennsylvania and Florida PERIOD
